description:
test/fixedbugs/bug454.go: add a test for CL 6564052
   Also mention that ignoring second blank identifier of range is required by the spec in the code.

   Fixes issue 4173.

messages.text: please add a comment in the compiler to explain that it is not only an optimization

Wow, Didn't realize that I'd also fixed a bug.

I think that just the panicking range loop would suffice, but otherwise LGTM.

Hello daniel.morsing@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

On 2012/09/29 11:56:41, minux wrote:
> PTAL
> 
> On 2012/09/29 11:32:06, DMorsing wrote:
> > I think that just the panicking range loop would suffice
> Deleted.
> 
> On 2012/09/29 11:43:45, remyoudompheng wrote:
> > please add a comment in the compiler to explain that it is not only an
> > optimization
> Done.

LGTM

PTAL

On 2012/09/29 11:32:06, DMorsing wrote:
> I think that just the panicking range loop would suffice
Deleted.

On 2012/09/29 11:43:45, remyoudompheng wrote:
> please add a comment in the compiler to explain that it is not only an
> optimization
Done.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f4a92d7eeb8d ***

test/fixedbugs/bug454.go: add a test for CL 6564052
   Also mention that ignoring second blank identifier of range is required by the spec in the code.

   Fixes issue 4173.
